text: Sano nambo awala wakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone, basi chachalipila malipilo gao mwakwana ni kwajonjechesya mu ukoto Wakwe, nambo awala wakanile (kun'galagatila Allah) ni kulikwesya, basi tachalagasya ni ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope, soni ngasampata nkwagosa namuno nkwakamuchisya jwangawaga Allah
